feed.title: cloud.gov
feed.subtitle: Expedite your agency’s path to a secure and compliant cloud. cloud.gov provides an application environment that enables rapid deployment and ATO assessment for modern web applications.

entry.title: August 8th Cloud.gov Release Notes

entry.title: New platform protections against malicious activity

link.title: New platform protections against malicious activity

entry.summary: In response to some recent incidents that caused outages on the platform, the cloud.gov team has added new platform protections against malicious activity. Notably, the team has added rate limiting by IP address to mitigate the effect of surges of malicious traffic on the platform.

entry.title: November 9th cloud.gov Change Log
entry.summary: The cloud.gov team is working on providing change logs so everyone can see new features and updates.

entry.title: Updating existing instances to gp3 storage volumes is now supported

link.title: Updating existing instances to gp3 storage volumes is now supported

entry.summary: Updating to gp3 storage volumes for existing RDS and Elasticsearch/Opensearch instances is now supported

entry.title: cloud.gov Page’s Federalist ATO Extension
entry.summary: The cloud.gov Pages’s Federalist ATO has been extended until February 28th, 2024

entry.title: Brokered storage volumes upgraded to gp3

link.title: Brokered storage volumes upgraded to gp3

entry.summary: Storage volumes across all brokered plans have been upgraded to gp3

entry.title: Announcing FedRAMP CSP Community mailing list

link.title: Announcing FedRAMP CSP Community mailing list

entry.summary: Email cloud-gov-compliance@gsa.gov from your CSP email to join

entry.title: New versions of PostgreSQL supported
entry.summary: PostgreSQL versions 13, 14, and 15 are now fully supported on cloud.gov
